channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Geode
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Geode

item.title: CVE-2017-5649|2024-08-05T15:11:47.417Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20geode
item.description: Apache Geode before 1.1.1, when a cluster has enabled security by setting the security-manager property, allows remote authenticated users with CLUSTER:READ but not DATA:READ permission to access the data browser page in Pulse and consequently execute an OQL query that exposes data stored in the cluster.
